EmailTemplate.description: Notify Owner and admin that another user is requesting for budget
EmailTemplate.name: CPQ Quote Another User Request To Unlock Budget
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Apttus_Proposal__Proposal__c.Apttus_Proposal__Proposal_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Apttus_Proposal__Proposal__c.Budget_Checked_Out_By__c},
{!User.Name} has requested to unlock your budget, to review or edit budget. You currently have the budget open and therefore locked, at your next opportunity please “Save and Attach” and close your UPT.xls to save and unlock your budget. To allow {!User.Name} to access your budget.
Thank you
